subject: Football
lead_paragraph: While the current Jets are unrivaled as trash talkers, cornerback Johnny Sample, who died in 2005, was known to jaw in the 1950s and ’60s and had a key role in Super Bowl III.
snippet: While the current Jets are unrivaled as trash talkers, cornerback Johnny Sample, who died in 2005, was known to jaw in the 1950s and ’60s and had a key role in Super Bowl III.
